<strong style="display: block;">A firm has an unlevered value of $500 million and permanent debt of $200 million. The corporate tax rate is 30%. According to Modigliani–Miller with taxes, what is the value of the levered firm?</strong>

<label><input type="radio" name="module8_mcq_q61" value="D"> D. $650 million</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module8_mcq_q61" value="E"> E. $700 million</label><br>
